<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=NASA%2BPack%2B-%2BJAZZteroid%2BRedirect%2B-%2B1%252F4&channel=hocgaming&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=3972021"></object></p>

<p>If there’s two things <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/hocgaming/"><strong>HOCgaming</strong></a> loves, it’s jazz and <em><strong>KSP</strong></em>. Watch part one of his <em><strong>KSP: ARM</strong></em> experimental stream and have a look at what was, along with the addition of some smooth, smooth sounds.</p>
I knew it was HOCgaming the instant I read jazz! I love his smooooove jazz.
